name: Type Defender
description:
Defend your base by typing the words above enemies heads to defeat them!

Compete against the world on the global highscore leaderboards. As well as against your own personal best scores.

Adjustable difficulty level for different typing speeds.

I made this in my spare time while working on my main game project, The Race Factory, available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1230660/TRF__The_Race_Factory/
